strapiPost.title: Cinco de Mayo en NWA
strapiPost.content:
Happy Cinco de Mayo! NWA restaurants do May 5th right, offering all sorts of specials to their menus for the day.

As if the specials weren't enough, your Guac is on "The Rock" tonight...yes, Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson. He's supporting local restaurants by paying for customers' guac when they order a Teremana cocktail. Check out the full details to make sure you get your guac paid for.

Here are some of the Cinco de Mayo deals and specials available tonight in NWA:

  • Tula Restaurant (Fayetteville) - Tula will be serving a special cocktail just for Guac on the Rock and a street food-inspired menu just for today to celebrate!
  • Xuma Kitchens (Fayetteville) - Xuma will be featuring a signature dish, the Especial Esteban, for Cinco de Mayo ONLY. Here for a good time...not for a long time.
  • La Huerta (Fayetteville) - Giving the people what they want... $12 margarita pitchers and $2 Coronas starting at 11am. First 200 people receive a free party t-shirt.
  • Azul Tequila (Bentonville & Springdale) - They will have beer and food specials running all day and live music at the Bentonville location.
  • Mojitos Mexican Grill (Fayetteville) - The Uptown Mexican joint will have select fajitas specials, beer, and margarita specials all day long.
  • Abuelo's Mexican Restaurant (Rogers) - Drink specials including the Flag Margarita and El Jefe.
  • Table Mesa (Bentonville) - $10 (per person) tequila flights and $30 p/p family style meals, which includes starters, salad, entree, sides, and Mexican dessert - bring the friends!
  • Chuy's (Rogers) - Drink specials including discounts on beers, Texas 'Tinis, and 'Ritas with a limited Blackberry 'Rita.

Â¡Salud!
